sentences: M천ni rahvas on alati 체ksmeelne, m천ni aga alati erimeelne.
Grupp erimeelseid oli tulnud valitsushoone ette meelt avaldama.
context: The word 'erimeelne' is an adjective that describes someone or something that has a different opinion from others or thinks differently. It can be used to describe individuals, groups, or coalitions who are not in agreement with the majority or mainstream view.
